meanings.definition: Convert (a video or audio signal) into a coded form.
meanings.sent1: She was transcoding the video to make it smaller for sharing online.
meanings.sent2: The software automatically handles transcoding when you upload a video.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved transcoding the music into a secret message.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to be transcoded into a different language, confusing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes transcoded her emotions onto the canvas.

meanings.definition: The process of converting data from one format to another.
meanings.sent1: Transcoding can sometimes result in a loss of quality in the final file.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in fast and efficient transcoding services.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show had a skit about the chaos caused by a mix-up in transcoding.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, transcoding is like translating a song into a different language.
meanings.sent5: The transcoding of the ancient text revealed hidden meanings to the scholars.
